hero.title: PARIS 2025
hero.subtitle: BUILDING MISSIONARY BRIDGES
hero.description: Join us for the most anticipated global conference bringing together thought leaders, innovators and changemakers in the heart of Paris.

about.title: About The Conference
about.para1: PARIS 2025 brings together the brightest minds and industry leaders from around the globe to exchange ideas, discuss trends, and shape the future.
about.para2: Over four immersive days in the heart of Paris, attendees will engage in thought-provoking sessions, hands-on workshops, and unparalleled networking opportunities.
about.para3: Whether you're a seasoned professional, a rising star, or simply passionate about innovation, PARIS 2025 promises an unforgettable experience that will inspire and empower.

days.title: 4 Days
days.description: Of immersive sessions, workshops and networking events

speakers.title: 50+ Speakers
speakers.description: Thought leaders and experts from around the world

venues.title: Iconic Venues
venues.description: Located in the heart of beautiful Paris

speakers.title: Our Speakers
speakers.description: Hear from pioneers, innovators, and thought leaders who are shaping the future

schedule.title: Conference Schedule
schedule.description: Plan your PARIS 2025 experience with our comprehensive program

venue.title: Venue Information
venue.description: PARIS 2025 will take place at the prestigious Palais des Congrès, a state-of-the-art conference center in the heart of Paris.

transport.title: Getting There
transport.metro: By Metro: Line 1, Porte Maillot station
transport.rer: By RER: Line C, Neuilly - Porte Maillot station
transport.cdg: From Charles de Gaulle Airport: 45 minutes by taxi or Air France shuttle
transport.orly: From Orly Airport: 30 minutes by taxi

register.title: Register for PARIS 2025
register.description: Secure your spot at the most anticipated global conference of the year. Early bird pricing available for a limited time.
register.questions: Have questions about registration or need assistance?
